ft
Class Interface.Model

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ft.Interface.Model
Direct Known Subclasses:
Interface.Analog, Interface.Cycle, Interface.Digital, Interface.Motor
Enclosing class:
Interface
protected abstract static class Interface.Model
extends java.lang.Object

base class for models, manages state and calls observers. This is static so that Change may be nested. This requires that queue must be an argument to setCurrent().

Inner Class Summary
protected static class Interface.Model.Change
          declares callback from notifyObservers() back to Model.

Method Detail

getCurrent

public int getCurrent()
Returns:
current state.

setCurrent

public void setCurrent(Interface.Queue queue,
                       int pending)
suggests new state. If this is called too fast, intermittent new states are lost.
Parameters:
pending - if different from current state make it pending and ask queue to schedule an update.

addObserver

public void addObserver(java.lang.Object observer)
Parameters:
observer - to receive appropriate edge().
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if observer is null.

removeObserver

public void removeObserver(java.lang.Object observer)
Parameters:
observer - to be removed.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if observer is null or not observing.

update

public abstract void update()
pushes pending into current state. Called by Queue or other thread. Should call notifyObservers() unsynchronized if there is a change.

notifyObservers

protected void notifyObservers(Interface.Model.Change change)
Parameters:
change - called back with interested observers.
